snippet: As the economic recovery sputters on, consumer spending could overtake corporate earnings as the main buttress of the rebound.
abstract: Paul J Lim Fundamentally column points out that, as the economic recovery sputters on, consumer spending could overtake corporate earnings as the main buttress of the rebound; cautions, however, that it is debatable whether consumer spending will pick up soon.
lead_paragraph: As the economic recovery sputters on, consumer spending could overtake corporate earnings as the main buttress of the rebound.

headline.seo: Consumers May Need to Retake the Recovery’s Reins
headline.main: The Recovery’s Fate, Back in Consumers’ Hands
headline.print_headline: The Recovery’s Fate, Back in Consumers’ Hands
